name: Dragon Skulle
overview: Dragon Skulle is the fourth, and final game in Ultimate Play The Game's C64 exclusive Sir Arthur Pendragon saga. In this game, you are trying to search for the evil skull of souls. You begin an a small island where the evil skull has summoned many minions to eliminate you. You discover that many people have tried to obtain this skull. Their graves are inside the cave, and their life force may help you or try to kill you. The ultimate forces of chaos and darkness are gathering as they meet you in the cave.
